channel.title: Dementhium [634] npc attacking

item.title: Dementhium [634] npc attacking
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

ok so im adding barrows and i have literally everything except when i go to attack lets say ahrims it says this npc in not attack able. any ideas on what to do? it also says to add the animantions for attacking,blocking,dieing.

if you could help me with the basic attacking blocking dieing stuff and making the npc attack able that would be great.

(the code for the non-attackable npc not just ahrims this is in general)

private void attack(Player player, Message in) { in.readByte(); int index = in.readLEShortA(); NPC npc = World.getWorld().getNpcs().get(index); if (npc == null) return; if (!npc.isAttackable()) { player.sendMessage("This NPC is not attackable, please post it in bug reports. If you have the animations"); player.sendMessage("for attacking, blocking, and dying, it'd also be a plus. Thanks :-)"); return; } player.getCombatState().setVictim(npc); Combat.process(player); }

Read full topic
